name: Don't Get Fired (Magnus_coles, jermrellum)
description:
Survive in a cut throat work environment by working hard and right, Or bear the consequences of having a sadist boss.

Basic Instructions:

Work correctly by replying to emails as fast as possible, if you fail, you get sent to have a chance at redeeming yourself, if the odds are in your favor.

Roll the dice by clicking on the die.

Loud the gun by clicking on the bullets, The amount is based on the number that you got from the roll.

Lower the number, the less likely you are gonna get shot.

Authors:

1. Magnus. 3D artist.

2. Jermrellum. Programmer.

3. Bismuth. Music.
